name: Canadian Nuts
description:
In this wacky adaptation of hungry hungry hippos, 4 players must battle it out in the given timeframe to kick, push & shove as many acorns into their tree holes as they can! Keep an eye out for special acorns that have mysterious abilities; mess with your opponents or gain a boost - it's anybody's game!

Created for DMG's Gym Jam 2015

Credits

  • Lee Tran (Programming)
  • Kim Koronya (3D/2D art)
  • Brittney Oberfeld (UI and 2D Art)
  • Jen Costa (Sound and Music)

Note: This game requires 4 xbox controllers to be connected in order for it to work.
